attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cash for honours...
Loans, not donations...
Calls for resignations are made far too easily these days and may be considered reactionary or alarmist.

However, this has just gone too far.  Are we really supposed to believe, after everything else that has happened, that Mr Hain 'forgot' about 100,000 pounds?

It really is time someone took responsibility for their responsibilities.  The electorate deserve better.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
